name: Baddest Hair Day
description: You try to cut your own hair. You watch as your self-esteem falls to the floor.

name: Emergency Ex-it
description: Looks like your ex is better off without you after all...

name: Ghosted
description: You get ghosted by your dino date. "They must actually be dead", you say to yourself as your tears salt your dinner for one.

name: Left Behind... Again
description: Your friends plan a road trip without you. The exhaust fumes hit you as the drive away.

name: Ooh, Burn...
description: The cookies you were looking forward to all day burned to a crisp.

name: Outer Circle
description: Are the other dinosaurs really talking about you? Yes.

name: The Future is Bleak
description: You visit a fortune teller and the crystal ball explodes... that can't be a good sign.

name: The Sad Truth
description: You lie awake at night thinking about how much of a disappointment you are.

name: SPA Day
description: Your relaxing spa day turns into tragedy as you start to sink in hot tar.

name: Uncommon Cold
description: Is it just a cough... or are you secretly dying? Time to start panicking.

name: Brigth Idea
description: "The sun isn't actually that bright", they said. You proved them wrong.

name: Leaf me Alone
description: You get cut by a particularly sharp leaf.

name: Downpour
description: When it rains, it pours... but only on you.

name: This feels personal
description: A small earthquake hits that sems to have happened only under you. You fall through a crack in the earth.

name: Trapped
description: If a tree falls on you in a forest and no one is around to save you, is this you new life now?

name: Casual Afternoon Stroll
description: You are hiking a volcano that's been dormant for thousands of years. It erupts.

name: A Day at the Beach
description: Your beach day turns into a whale of a surprise...

name: Feeling Squirrely
description: Life is going great!... Just kidding of course. You are attacked by sabertoothed squirrels.

name: Shark with Legs
description: Just your average day, running in horror from a FREAKING LAND SHARK.

name: Armed and Dangerous
description: The tiny dinos looked adorable until they threatened to kill you and your family.

name: Stomped
description: You're crushed by a mega dino and your herd awkardly walks away.

name: Love Hurts
description: All you want is to be loved. A boa constrictor gives you a "hug". You're thrilled.

name: Lil' Cannibal
description: Mayby next time you should think twice bfore babysitting a carnivore.

name: Fired Up
description: Prehistoric fire ants unleash their wrath on you for taking a nap on their hill.

name: Meteor!
description: This card acts as any type of Disaster card.
